sentence: Coty Inc. ( COTY ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 29, 2015.
A cash dividend payment of $0.25 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 15, 2015.
Shareholders who purchased COTY prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 25% increase over the prior year.
The previous trading day's last sale of COTY was $26.87, representing a -17.88% decrease from the 52 week high of $32.72 and a 70.71% increase over the 52 week low of $15.74.
COTY is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
COTY's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $.64.
Zacks Investment Research reports COTY's forecasted earnings growth in 2016 as 2.78%, compared to an industry average of -2.8%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the COTY Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
